title: pokerplayers
author: pokerplayers
content: Are you a poker player ?Do you enjoy playing poker online and are you good?We are looking to stake online poker players in a poker crypto site , no investment needed.We will choose 10 players that have a solid knowledge of poker and stake them online in our poker site.Hours + weekly percentages will be negotiated , players must have sharkscope database or equivelant to show that they are poker players.All details via telegram please do not PM hereTELEGRAM @Dan1090

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.body: I advise to change the thread titlelooks like you need prop players or shillers to play for you, yes?this has nothing to do with staking for sure

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: You should make your intentions very clear; if you need poker players who will help you test your betting site, you should say so. I don't understand what you actually mean by "staking" a player on weekly payment. Or you are trying to say that your selected players will be paid on a weekly basis.Â You should drop more details instead of just a Telegram user ID, and I believe you will get volunteers from here.
